9/10 | This scoreboard allows you to evaluate your performance based on specific metrics and track your progress over time. You can set targets for each category and work on improving your performance in areas where you are currently falling short. You can also use this as a tool to guide discussions with your manager during your performance review and identify areas for development and growth.
